class_notes: This class is for students enrolled in the BSHES program only.
course_description: The purpose of this course is to provide students with a foundation in designing and conducting an evaluation of a public health program. Students learn about various types of evaluation, with an emphasis on utilization-focused assessments. Further, students will apply the CDC Framework for Evaluation as they design and implement a small-scale public health evaluation for a community-based organization.
prerequisites: This class is for BSHESMPH students only.
